pull.title: Declare wallet.h functions inline
pull.body: As pointed out by @paveljanik in #9039, the function whose definition is in wallet/wallet.h should be declared inline, and clang warns about this. Do what it says.

events.body: Yea, sure. Though I am morally offended by the compiler warning about it. :P  (utACK)

@gmaxwell I feel offended by the fact that I was not able to find the reason why it was not shown before on the master...

ACK https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/9071/commits/2ca882ad41f170e705e71766d2b20ea08dbd6a7a
I feel offended because I am not presented this warning even after cherry-picking the commits in  #9039
Looks like we have to put some bounty for the solution - 100 tBTC from me for explanation :-)
I'm morally offended by having to merge this obscene change. utACK https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/9071/commits/2ca882ad41f170e705e71766d2b20ea08dbd6a7a
